html: New water infrastructure law authorizes water resource projects & policies nationwide, including two #NJ7 provisions of mine: 1. expedited removal of the Musconetcong River’s hazardous Warren Glen Dam. 2. fast-track feasibility study for Rahway River Basin flood mitigation.
text:
New water infrastructure law authorizes water resource projects & policies nationwide, including two #NJ7 provisions of mine:

1. expedited removal of the Musconetcong River’s hazardous Warren Glen Dam.

2. fast-track feasibility study for Rahway River Basin flood mitigation.

html: I’ve spoken to Mayor James Dodd regarding the terrible fire that occurred in Dover today & offered whatever help the federal gov’t can render. I extend my thoughts to those displaced & commend the brave first responders who risked their lives to protect the residents of Dover.

html: It’s time to end the rules of gridlock in the Senate. Nearly every governing body in the US makes decisions by majority vote. But not the Senate, where 60 votes are required for cloture to overcome a filibuster. It is time to end these arcane rules & get the Senate working again.
text: It’s time to end the rules of gridlock in the Senate. Nearly every governing body in the US makes decisions by majority vote. But not the Senate, where 60 votes are required for cloture to overcome a filibuster. It is time to end these arcane rules & get the Senate working again.
